segments.text: I'm just watching this scene unfold in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely engrossed in her dish-drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water pouring over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look, her foot is right in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious she is to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really climbing for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly, about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl is just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe nobody is paying attention to these hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a cascade of potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
